entry.title: $2000 // All new appliances, bathroom :": and built-in microwave
entry.content:
2 Bed / 1 Bath in Ridgewood, Queens. All Pets Allowed. Heat and hot water included at this all-new renovated 2-bedroom two blocks from the Fresh Pond M! All new appliances, bathroom, and built-in microwave. A very pretty block right by The Spot cafe, Valentino's grocery, Kermes, Queens Tavern, and tons more. Fall in love with Fresh Pond, and still commute to Union Square in 35-40min. We'd be happy to show you around.

Hardwood Floors
High Ceilings
Built in microwave
Stainless Steel Appliances

Stone countertops

entry.title: $2695 // Awesome 3bd/1ba - by Montrose L - 15 min to Union Sq! <<DEAL
entry.content:
NO BROKERS FEES > Text ALAN show contact info, text me if I dont answer.
PLEASE REFERENCE CODE: 198MONT-3BED

3 BR 1 BATH

Located minutes from the Montrose L (15 minutes to union square)

This beautiful apartment boasts an open kitchen concept with granite counter tops and full sized SS appliances including built in microwave. There are 3 true bedrooms with Windows in each and a sizable living room. Step into a newly tiled bathroom with a marble bath/deep soaking tub and rainfall shower. The building has a common outdoor area perfect for lounging on a breezy summer day. Net Rent!
